page.pg_title: Topics and objectives for this module

text_content.paragraph: There are a number of tasks you can perform under the Map tab. As we progress through this module the following topics will describe them in more detail:

bullets.bullet: The Map Interface and the Legend

text_content.paragraph: Let's review the Learning Objectives for this module. After completing this module, you will be able to:

bullets.bullet: Define multiple parameters in a Map/VAL search

page.prompt: CLICK THE NEXT ARROW TO CONTINUE.
